General.Name: Suzhou Douson Drilling & Production Equipment Co Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou Douson Drilling & Production Equipment Co.,Ltd. engages in research and development, manufacture, and sale of oil, natural gas, and shale gas drilling and production equipment in China, the United States, Canada, Australia, South America, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and internationally. The company offers wellhead equipment and oil tree, valve products, fracturing complete sets, high pressure pipe fittings, well control devices, underwater products, other oil and gas drilling and production, and oil and gas processing equipment. In addition, it offers fracturing and rental fracking, as well as scientific research and technical services. The company's products are used in shale oil and gas and tight oil and gas exploration, onshore oil exploration, offshore oil extraction, and oil and gas pipeline transportation. Suzhou Douson Drilling & Production Equipment Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 16 West Henggang Street, Suzhou, China
